snippet: An appeal that risks new regional entanglements in what is already at least a three-way conflict among the Islamic State and two rival Libyan factions.
abstract: Libyan foreign minister Mohamed el-Dayri asks Arab League countries for military help in fighting Islamic State; plea comes amid rising chaos in country.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Prague, and Merna Thomas from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: An appeal that risks new regional entanglements in what is already at least a three-way conflict among the Islamic State and two rival Libyan factions.

headline.main: Libya Asks Arab League Countries to Help Battle Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Libya Asks Arab League Countries to Help Battle Islamic State

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
